resources.string: Tap the delete button once to delete the last digit or tap and hold it to clear all.
Slide up to open converter and slide down to close it.
You don\'t have internet connection. Try again later...

1. Tap the switch button at the center to switch between your base currency and your target currency. 

2. Tap the delete button once to delete the last digit or tap and hold it to clear all. 

3. Switch action doesn't work because of the Fixer Api free plan limitations :D.
